Room.Name: Nartiz Ror
Room.ShortDescription: You are over a rocky arm of the Nartiz Mountain Range. 100.n0.e1.s2.w0
Room.LongDescription: The area below is hot and covered with jagged rocks, and there is no ground cover. The only life you see are a few reptiles. Hard to determine how big they are from this height, from the back of a dragon. Brownhaven is to the north.
